title: Bug 4974 - Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When clicking on 'Ok' after changing the project properties to use the project as the source folder and the project as the output location, the following error message is displayed: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. The problem is that setting the output location and the classpath are treated as separate operations, causing an illegal state to be created.
SR: 1. Create a project with 'src' as the source folder and 'bin' as the output location. 2. Open the project properties. 3. Change the settings to use the project as the source folder and the project as the output location. 4. Click on 'Ok' to save the changes.
